name: Pizzeria Giovanni
info: A really tasty pizza-joint right near the Old Town Square

name: U Zlateho Tygra (The Golden Tiger)
info: One of the oldest beer halls in Prague from about 1700.

name: Lokál Dlouhá
info: It’s only a few minutes walk from Old Town Square. It’s in a very long, narrow building with a cool atmosphere, and the food is amazing!

name: Absintheria Franz Kafka
info: You can taste about 100 absinthes. Enjoy a special experience and come to sample unique absinthe cocktails, beer, ice cream or chocolate.
